data.title: Culture At Connoisseur Media
data.meta_description: People are the heart and soul of Connoisseur Media. That is our culture. We love what we do and give each other the tools to succeed.
data.text:
The Wolf 103.1, Long Island’s Country, welcomes Alexa Neo to the on air staff. Alexa is a renowned radio DJ, singer and music blogger from Long Island, NY. With a keen ear for talent and an innate ability to decipher the nuances of sound, she ventured into the realm of radio as she quickly made a name for […]

WEBE 108 signed on the air forty years ago and to celebrate former DJs, sales staff and management were invited to share stories and memories at Stratford CT event space, Riverview Bistro. Many of the original staff from the 1984 sign on were present including current morning show host, Storm N. Norman. Former disc jockeys […]

AJ, the co-host of Connecticut’s most popular morning show “Chaz and AJ in the Morning” on 99.1 PLR and 95.9 the FOX, will live for 24 hours in a tiny glass box at McDermott Chevrolet and Lexus of New Haven. AJ will get into the box at 9am on Thursday, November 9th, and come out […]

Connoisseur Media’s WWSK/94.3 The Shark welcomes major market rock veteran Aimee Brooks to the on-air lineup. Aimee takes over weekdays between 11am and 2pm, beginning Monday, June 26. Brooks brings with her a wealth of rock knowledge and experience making her the perfect fit for the “everything that rocks” format. “This is a big win […]

Jennifer Grullon is added as co-host in the afternoon on STAR 99.9 (WEZN-FM). Jennifer comes to Connecticut from Burlington VT and will join market vet Kevin Begley. Jennifer remarked, “I could not be more excited to join Kevin Begley at Star 99.9. Thank you to the whole team at Connoisseur Media for challenging me with this […]

Connoisseur Media announced today the promotion of Ron Fried to National Sales Manager. He will be responsible for working with the Christal National sales offices across the country and effectively promoting the strength of our audio and digital platforms. “Ron is a valued and important member of our sales efforts on Long Island, and we […]

94.3 The Shark’s Brian Orlando is on a mission to raise awareness about the struggle of depression on Long Island and to save lives. As the 10th leading cause of death overall in the United States, suicide claims the lives of nearly 50,000 Americans annually. For Orlando, his mission began in 2017 with the death […]
